entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 10. POP 70%
